title: Ethanol IMF and type of solid

content.description:
Directions: Each set of lettered choices below refers to the numbered statements immediately following it. SeÂ­lect the one lettered choice that best fits each statement. A choice may be used once, more than once, or not at all in each set.

(A) A network solid with covalent bonding

(B) A molecular solid with zero dipole moment

(C) A molecular solid with hydrogen bonding

(D) An ionic solid

(E) A metallic solid
content.question: Solid ethyl alcohol, C2H5OH

choices.label: A network solid with covalent bonding
A molecular solid with zero dipole moment
A molecular solid with hydrogen bonding

content.answer: A molecular solid with hydrogen bonding

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
